Module com.example.fiftyclash
Package com.example.fiftyclash.models

Class Table

java.lang.Object
com.example.fiftyclash.models.Table
public class Table extends Object
Represents the game table, which holds the draw deck, play deck, and manages the players' cards. This class is responsible for initializing the game, managing the deck of cards, and maintaining the state of the current card.

    • Table

      public Table(Player player, Player[] machinesList)
      Constructor for initializing the table with a human player and a list of machine players.
      Parameters:
      player - The human player.
      machinesList - The array of machine players.

  • Method Details

    • initializeTable

      public void initializeTable(Player player, Player[] machinesList)
      Initializes the game table by shuffling the deck and drawing cards for the players. This method is called at the start of the game to set up the draw deck, play deck, and deal cards to the players.
      Parameters:
      player - The human player.
      machinesList - The array of machine players.

    • setCurrentCard

      public void setCurrentCard()
      Sets the current card to the most recent card from the play deck.

    • refillDeck

      public void refillDeck()
      Refills the draw deck by moving all cards from the play deck back into the draw deck and shuffling them.

    • returnCardsToDeck

      public void returnCardsToDeck(Card[] cards)
      Returns the specified cards to the draw deck.
      Parameters:
      cards - The cards to be returned to the draw deck.
